content: you will be receiving a pdf file that you will be able to download instantly once you have paid this is instructions on how to crochet your own labubu costume this is not a finished product this pdf file will come complete with details that you will need with pictures for aid this pattern level is for advance crocheters use 3mm hook and 5 ply milk cotton yarn if you are tight crocheter can use 3 5mm hook *****you may sell finished products but do not alter or sell this pattern as your own if you sell products made from my patterns please provide proper credit to me knitworkz and provide a link to my shop www etsy com/shop/knitworkz and instagram www instagram com/knitworkz ******* thank you happy crocheting
